title: Practice Challenge
description: Create an app with: 1. At least 3 network images 2. Different sizes 3. At least one circular image 4. Text labels under each image ---
instructions: Create an app with: 1. At least 3 network images 2. Different sizes 3. At least one circular image 4. Text labels under each image ---

testCases.expectedOutput: Image.network widgets loading from picsum.photos URLs
Landscape Photo, Square Photo, Profile Photo labels visible

hints.text: Use Image.network('url') to load images from URLs
CircleAvatar uses backgroundImage: NetworkImage('url') for circular images

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to wrap images in SizedBox with explicit height
commonMistakes.consequence: Unbounded height error or layout issues
commonMistakes.correction: Use SizedBox or Container with height property

commonMistakes.consequence: Image may overflow or look distorted
commonMistakes.correction: Add fit: BoxFit.cover to control how image fills space
